text: Pros: - Great Food - Great service - Great variety  Cons: - Expansive - Place fills up quick, better get a reservation  Conclusion: On the South Shore, definitely the place!

C'est quand même bon, mais beaucoup plus cher qu'ailleurs. On paie un peu pour le beau décor. La soupe aigre-piquante est excellente.  Si vous choisissez un plat identifié "épicé," sachez qu'il est probable que le plat sera à peine épicé. Si vous lui demandez si c'est épicé, le serveur ne fera rien de plus que vous répéter ce qui est déjà écrit dans le menu. Ne vous y fiez pas ! Dites simplement au serveur quel degré d'épice vous souhaitez.  Bon mais cher.

The food is excellent but expensive...It used to be cheaper but the place got popular and they raised their prices. Their Tao sauce chicken is the best i ever had! You must try it. The staff there is really rude though. I had a groupon the other day and the manager or owner told me that i had to call and make a reservation first like 5 times and kept saying that she would ve refused me on a more crowded night. Also they tried to make me pay a tip they calculated themsleves. I hate when businesses have groupons and when it's time to serve you they treat you like shit because you bought their groupon. Like just don't put deals like that online if it's such a pain in the ass for you.
